## Objective
Following are the objectives of this assignment :

- Write a shiny application with associated supporting documentation. The documentation should be thought of as whatever a user will need to get started using your application.

- Deploy the application on Rstudio's shiny server

- Share the application link by pasting it into the text box provided on Wesite

- Share your server.R and ui.R code on github

## Approach

- BMI Calculator will take Height, Weight, name and sex as inputs

- BMI will be calculated by the formula ( weight)/(height)^2

- Weights will in kgs

- Height in Meters
